sources.title: 3000 Miles To Graceland
sources.description: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

metadata.Plot: It was an ingenious enough plan: rob the Riviera Casino's count room during an Elvis impersonator convention. But Thomas Murphy decided to keep all the money for himself and shot all his partners, including recently-freed ex-con Michael Zane. With $3.2 million at stake, the Marshals Service closing in, and single mom Cybil Waingrow and her son Jesse constantly confounding things, Michael must track down Murphy.
metadata.Writer: Richard Recco, Demian Lichtenstein, Kevin Bernhardt
metadata.Actors: Kurt Russell, Kevin Costner, Courteney Cox
